results: You may be at risk of falling

questions: What's your perfect vacation?
Which snack would you prefer?

results: Sneakers
You are on the move! As a sneaker, you have the traction and support to take on any adventure.
Slippers
Cozy and comfy, you are up for anything as long as it can be done at home. Be sure you have rubber soles so you stay stable instead of slip sliding.
Flip flops/Sandals
Summer fun is your middle name. Before hitting the lake or the beach, make sure your sandals strapped on well.
Winter Boots
The snow and mountains call to you so strap on your boots and some extra traction and explore the winter wonderland that is Vermont.

answers: Everyone. I don't believe in secrets.

results: Hippo
You are fierce and loyal to those you love. No one should underestimate you.
Giraffe
Fun loving and free are two ways to describe you. Everyone enjoys your company and appreciates your kind and gentle nature.
Monkey
Wow, you are full of energy! You are hilarious, but your brain is no joke.
Armadillo
You're shy and put up a wall at first, but once someone breaks through the wall, you stick with them forever. You're the best friend there is. Never change.

quizName: What type of ice are you?
questions: How much do you like ice?
When was the last time you used ice?
Someone takes the last ice cube from the ice tray. What do you do?
You're at a restaurant and you're served a glass of ice water. What do you do?
What are your opinions on Winter?

answers: I understand the appeal and use it for some things.
I could eat it constantly for the rest of my life.
I think it’s extremely underrated and works as a food as well as a cooler in drinks.
How can you possibly expect me to remember that?
I am eating it/drinking something with it now.
Fume inside but don’t say anything and refill it.
Bow down to them and thank them for finally finishing the ice so you no longer have to be near that terrible creation.
Do nothing. It’s not that important. You can live without ice.
Smile politely but secretly wish your water was room temperature instead of nice and cool.
Profusely thank them and promise your firstborn to them as repayment for the kind gift.
It's the best! I love to do Winter activities and eat the snow around me!
I like some Winter activities and snow is fun!
It's fine. A little too cold for me.

results: Shaved Ice

You are the shining pearl of ice! Everyone loves you and if they don’t they are just jealous of your flawless taste and amazing personality. Don’t change a thing about yourself. You are perfect the way you are!
Crushed Ice

You are pretty close to perfect. Despite having some faults, you are constantly growing and evolving. You try your best, and, although some people might not be your biggest fan at first, you always win them over eventually. Stay cool!
Ice Cubes
You are perfectly fine. People may not see much of interest when they look at you, but you know what can change that? A love of ice!
Slush on the streets 2 months into winter
Look, your result isn't great, but the good news is that the only way to go is up. Start rethinking your life choices (ice opinions) and whaat you can improve on.
